#hdf5r
```{r}
library(hdf5r)
library(dplyr)
library(cranium)
library(broom)
library(tidyverse)

file <- "AT_wildtype_101_Probabilities.h5"

tidy_brain <- file %>%
  read_h5() %>%
  tidy()
```
